name: 曾恕銘
objective: 機率、離散隨機變數、連續隨機變數、聯合機率分布、期望值、變異數、大數法則及中央極限定理。
schedule:
1.	Introduction to statistics and data analysis
2.	probability
3.	random variables and (joint) probability distribution 
4.	mathematical expectation
5.	some discrete probability distribution
6.	some continuous probability distribution
7.	law of large numbers and central limit theorem
scorePolicy:
小考 20% 
大考 (2 次) 80%
課程參與 extra 10%
materials:
Probability & Statistics for Engineers and Scientists (9th edition) by Walpole et al.
機率與統計 [精華版] Walpole et al. 譯者 陳常侃等 歐亞書局
